Issues

Updated

entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-05-01
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • JIT: reconsider inlining methods that must throw #101777
  • Child Activity outliving its parent corrupts `Activity.Current` #101775
    Future
  • [API Proposal]: Simplify lookup of parsed TypeName in metadata #101774
  • Change in exception handling in 9.0 #101772
  • If Stream throws on Write, trying to close the stream throws again on Close #101771
  • ARM64-SVE: No obvious way to mask an Across function #101770
  • Malformed EventPipe request can crash the runtime #101764
    9.0.0
  • tracing/eventpipe/providervalidation/providervalidation/providervalidation.cmd test failure #101759
  • Cannot add System.Json to an Android .NET 8 project #101758

Closed

  • Generic dictionary lookup race condition on expansion due to JIT codegen issue #101131
    9.0.0
  • AssemblyBuilder still lacks SetEntryPoint #101667
  • [API Proposal]: Bulk copy properties from one object to another #101676
  • ILLink analyzer doesn't warn for unknown interpolated string #101733
    9.0.0
  • Huge output of 0's on >256 character to Convert.ToHexString() #101757
  • get_hostfxr_path memory leak in .NET 8 #101546
  • Unnecessary bounds check with ulong index #76198
    9.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: ContainerConfiguration WithAssemblies Retains the Actual Collection; and Can Become Cleared #101126
  • FileSystemWatcher limited to a single filespec filter. #101633

PullRequests

Created

  • Porting `SuspendAllThreads` from the NativeAOT to CoreCLR. #101782
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Don't enable use-after-return checking on Apple's Clang #101781
    area-Infrastructure
  • Update branding to 8.0.6 #101779
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Update branding to 6.0.31 #101776
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Provide MSBuild properties to use the new libc++ configuration we plan on using in our builds #101773
    area-Infrastructure, 9.0.0
  • Remove snapcraft files #101768
    area-Infrastructure-installer
  • Typename parsing cleanup #101767
    area-System.Reflection
  • JIT: Enable cross-block local assertion prop for natural loops #101763
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JIT ARM64-SVE: Add simple bitwise ops #101762
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • JIT: Bulk copy of byrefs #101761
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • JIT: Process all register kills in bulk in LSRA #101760
    area-CodeGen-coreclr

Merged

  • [PERF] Temp forced dotnet version: Use a version that will consistently be found. #101780
    area-Infrastructure
  • Fix generic runtime lookup expansion in Tier0 #101153
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix CodeQL issue cpp/enum-index in mono #101751
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • [JIT] SVE Cleanup: Merging formats SVE_AB_3A and SVE_AD_3A into SVE_AA_3A #101754
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [mono][debug-helpers] Parse W: prefix in MONO_VERBOSE_METHOD to match wrappers #101766
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • Track unknown value as result of unimplemented operations #101752
    linkable-framework, area-Tools-ILLink
  • Run MethodOutParameterDataFlow tests in analyzer #101735
    linkable-framework, area-Tools-ILLink
  • Bump main pre-release version to 5 #101468
    area-Infrastructure
  • Remove perfinfo-%pid.map #101697
    area-Tracing-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • [docs] Import mono manual page #101765
    documentation, area-Meta
  • Fix unnecessary bounds check with ulong index #101352
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Clean up in LowerStoreIndirCoalescing #101665
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [wasm] Update patch after template change #101712
    area-Build-mono
  • JIT ARM64-SVE: Add AddAcross #101674
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution, arm-sve
  • Arm64/Sve: Add SignExtendWidening* and ZeroExtendWidening* math APIs #101743
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, new-api-needs-documentation, arm-sve
  • Replace NETCOREAPP compiler directive with NET #101693
    area-Meta
  • Typos: ablity -> ability #101755
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions

Updated

  • [RISC-V] Add quirks for riscv to R2RDump #101683
    area-R2RDump-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • Remove received bytes length check #100619
    area-System.Net.Sockets, community-contribution
  • [Experiment] Change temporary entrypoints to be lazily allocated #101580
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Make normal statics simpler #99183
    NO-MERGE, area-VM-coreclr
  • Fix 97272 #99818
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [NOREVIEW][NOMERGE] HTTP/3 stress data corruption hunt #101624
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, area-System.Net.Http
  • JIT: Implement greedy RPO-based block layout #101473
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Backport #92375 and #93082 to release/8.0-staging #101744
    area-Infrastructure
  • make Socket useable after cancellation #99181
    area-System.Net.Sockets, 9.0.0
  • basic support for TCP fast open #99490
    area-System.Net.Sockets, new-api-needs-documentation, 9.0.0
  • Removed unused sessions from SSL_CTX internal cache #101684
    area-System.Net.Security
  • unblock Unix Domain Socket on Dispose on macOS #101753
    area-System.Net.Sockets, 9.0.0
  • JIT: synthesize PGO if no schema, when dynamic PGO is active #101739
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JIT: Allow moving handler regions in fgRelocateEHRegions #101613
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • GC: Fix survival rates for LOH/POH #100716
    area-GC-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • Fix regression from RuntimeType.AllocateValueType rewrite #101137
    area-VM-coreclr
  • [NO MERGE] generic wrapper methods for unsafe accessors #101732
    NO-MERGE, area-VM-meta-mono
  • [Test Only] async safe point interrupts after NOP change #101151
    NO-MERGE, area-VM-coreclr
  • Merge JIT/Methodical tests into the merged runners #101317
    area-Infrastructure
  • Linker dependency framework #101277
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Add `hostfxr_resolve_frameworks_for_runtime_config` for resolving runtime frameworks #101451
    area-Host, 9.0.0
  • Allow async interruptions on safepoints #95565
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Remove Thread::m_pDomain - always the one app domain #101749
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Add option to change SVE vector length for current and children processes #101295
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution, arm-sve
  • Code Versioning - move native code versioning state #101652
    area-VM-coreclr, Future
  • [WinHttpHandler] Move `_cachedSendPinnedBuffer` ownership to `WinHttpRequestState` #101725
    NO-MERGE, area-System.Net.Http, 9.0.0
  • [TEST] noop change to see if tests are passing #85694
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW
  • Try to reduce cost of Async #101605
    area-System.Runtime.CompilerServices
  • Support using the system rapidjson to build #101443
    area-Host, community-contribution
  • [wasm] Use source built emsdk packages for the runtime build #100266
    area-Build-mono

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-05-01
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • I don't see any debugging options. I have version 8.0 of net maui. #40617

Closed

  • `dotnet run` has different behavior with .NET 9 SDK #40606

PullRequests

Created

  • Update branding to 8.0.301 #40616
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Update branding to 8.0.206 #40615
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Update branding to 8.0.106 #40614
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Update branding to 6.0.423 #40610
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Update branding to 6.0.131 #40609
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Reference latest MSBuild for netcore MSBuild stuff #40603
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Merged

  • Put toolset archive into its own category #40594
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Temporarily disable the publish of the installer manifest #40580
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Updated

  • add signature VerifySigning for dotnet tools #39268
    Area-Tools
  • Add test #40548
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Use Ubuntu 24.04 Noble Numbat images by default starting in 8.0.300 #39614
    Servicing-approved, untriaged, DO NOT MERGE, Area-Containers
  • Prevent the Roslyn compiler package from being used on .NET Core MSBuild #39666
    untriaged, Area-NetSDK
  • Ingest new props file from installer and use it to auto-include Toolset Compilers package #39701
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Have --no-restore imply -restore:false to override any response file command-line arguments #40579
    untriaged, Area-CLI
  • Aspire #40111
    untriaged, Area-AspNetCore

entry.title: dotnet/csharplang - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-05-01
entry.content:
Issues

Updated

  • [Proposal]: First-Class Span Types #7905

PullRequests

  • Notes for 4/24/2024 #8092

Updated

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-05-01
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Add pragma to suppress all obsoletion warnings. #73292
  • Even though there is no conflict, name suggestion completions are numbered in some cases. #73291
  • Complete word appends `1` to parameter name #73290

Closed

  • Build fails on .NET 7 #73279
  • CS8602 false positive after TryGetValue #73274
  • Type inference for lambdas in collection expressions #73256

PullRequests

Created

  • Pull reading of last storage subsystem out of lock (part2) #73295
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Pull reading of last storage subsystem out of lock #73294
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Expose some useful helper methods #73289
    Area-IDE, untriaged

Merged

  • Move AsyncBatchingWorkQueue usage in telemetry to TelemetryLogging level #73287
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Document breaking change: Collection expression for type implementing `IEnumerable` must have elements implicitly convertible to `object` #73278
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Next
  • Move test reference assemblies forward #73266
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.11 to main #73288
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Require AddExplicitInterfaceImplementation for adding a type that implements member explicitly #73265
    Area-Interactive, untriaged, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.10 to release/dev17.11 #73286
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Partial properties: merging declarations and emit of simple cases #72999
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Partial Properties

Updated

  • Handle ref safety analysis for type parameters with 'allows ref struct' constraint #73281
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - RefStructInterfaces
  • Use a simple temp instead of InlineArray1 #73086
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Resolve extension members in all non-invocation contexts #73239
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Language Feature - Roles
  • Enable Arcade V3 publishing in PR Validation #73221
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Partial properties: diagnostics for mismatch between parts #73250
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Partial Properties
  • Ensure source paths are comparable with editorconfig directory paths #73100
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Nullable annotate InMethodyBinder #73270
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Razor fallback changes #73001
    Area-Compilers, untriaged

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-05-01
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Signalr hubconnection new parameter .WithStatefulReconnect #55473
  • -pt build images are deprecated #55466
    Infrastructure
  • OOM copying a file to memory in Blazor #55458
  • .NET 8 stable version of Microsoft.AspNetCore.ApiAuthorization.IdentityServer #55456

Closed

  • Use incoming ILLinkPack Version from dotnet/runtime #55468
    9.0-preview5
  • Installer of aspnetcore still contains wrong outdated .NET dotnet license information that makes it problematic to distribute #54434
    9.0-preview6
  • dotnet-openapi generates illegal method names with leading numbers (and other errors) #54521
  • feat: using `ProblemDetailsFactory` from DI on exception using Minimal API. #50924
  • Issue when trying to handle batch request in minimal api. #55008
  • Cannot bind custom class or record for HTTP request header with Minimal APIs #55117
  • Publishing broken in release/* branches #55454
    9.0-preview5
  • Codespaces doesn't initialize correctly #55272
  • Minify and bundle isolated css files and js scripts in Blazor Server Self Contained when publisihing : <projectname>.css file. #55428
  • Can we trust the `maxAllowedSize` of `IBrowserFile.OpenReadStream`? #55435
  • SignalR TypeScript client - WebSocket - surface out the 'upgrade' event #54865

PullRequests

Created

  • Update branding to 8.0.6 #55472
    area-infrastructure, 8.0.x
  • Update branding to 6.0.31 #55470
    area-infrastructure, 6.0.x
  • Add missing registry keys for Microsoft.AspNetCore.App #55467
    area-infrastructure
  • Enable trimming for OpenAPI package #55465
    area-mvc, feature-openapi, area-minimal
  • [release/2.1] Stop using -pt images #55463
    area-infrastructure, 2.1.x
  • [release/6.0] Switch off of -pt images #55462
    area-infrastructure, 6.0.x
  • [release/8.0] Switch off of -pt images #55461
    area-infrastructure, 8.0.x
  • [DO NOT MERGE] Add a dummy test #55457
    area-networking
  • [release/2.1] (deps): Bump modules/EntityFrameworkCore from `74055e1` to `c406784` #55450
    area-infrastructure, 2.1.x
  • [release/7.0] (deps): Bump src/submodules/spa-templates from `44db12e` to `1c23eb1` #55449
    area-infrastructure, 7.0.x
  • [release/7.0] (deps): Bump src/submodules/googletest from `77afe8e` to `d83fee1` #55448
    area-infrastructure, 7.0.x
  • [release/6.0] (deps): Bump src/submodules/googletest from `77afe8e` to `d83fee1` #55447
    area-infrastructure, 6.0.x
  • [release/8.0] (deps): Bump src/submodules/googletest from `77afe8e` to `d83fee1` #55446
    area-infrastructure, 8.0.x

Merged

  • Use incoming ILLinkPackVersion #55469
    area-infrastructure, 9.0-preview5
  • Exclude tests from CodeQL #55459
    area-infrastructure, 9.0-preview5
  • Switch off of -pt images #55460
    area-infrastructure, 9.0-preview5
  • [main] Don't publish version files in codesign jobs #55453
    area-infrastructure, 9.0-preview5
  • Update Selenium #55444
    area-infrastructure, 9.0-preview5
  • Don't publish version files in codesign jobs #55452
    area-infrastructure, 9.0-preview4

Updated

  • Add separate activities for Hub methods #55439
    area-signalr
  • Add a key management simulator for data protection #55348
    area-dataprotection
  • Allow HTTP2 encoder to split headers across frames #55322
    community-contribution, area-networking
  • [H/3] Fix code passed into QuicConnection.CloseAsync and QuicStream.Abort #55282
    area-networking
  • Fix script tag insertion in DomMerging #51184
    area-blazor, community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun, 9.0-preview5
  • [release/8.0] Handle rejected promises inside incoming Invocation messages #55230
    Servicing-approved, area-signalr, pending-ci-rerun, 8.0.x
  • Relocate webtransport streams initialisation from HTTP3 connection accept loop to streams type #55425
    community-contribution, area-networking
  • Use built-in OpenAPI support in templates #55343
    area-mvc

entry.title: dotnet/diagnostics - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-05-01
entry.content:
PullRequests

Merged

  • Fix CONTRACT return type #4649

Updated

  • Supports collecting GCSettingsEvent for gc-collect profile #4615
  • [SymbolStore] Add support to index .NET Framework Runtime debugging modules #4616
    DO NOT MERGE

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-05-01
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • CollectionView with grouping enabled doesn't reflect the change on UI when a child record is removed #22158
  • CollectionView with grouping enabled behaves abnormally after adding a new child record #22156
  • iOS : No Route to Host on LAN #22154
  • SwipeView Events - (SwipeView)sender.Open does not work #22153
  • Keyboard does not showing up on SearchHandler.Focus() #22151
  • 'Microsoft.Maui.Platform.LayoutView' does not have a constructor that takes one NativeHandle argument #22150
  • Android platform throws exception when loading image from HTTPS source. #22147
  • Functionality to check if GPS/Location is enabled on mobile #22146
  • Cannot bind Shell Items #22145
  • Flyout button is visible for a split second when navigating back to home page in Android #22144

Closed

  • MAUI publish spits out hundreds of unnecessary language folders #18862
  • Deployment or Debug removes files in FileSystem.AppDataDirectory #21445
  • Unable to launch app on iOS from both VS and VS MAC #16421
  • [iOS] Page titles do not appear until navigating when pushing a modal page at startup #20199
    Backlog
  • Border StrokeShape performance issues #18925
  • [Android] Crash removing item from CarouselView #19786
    .NET 8 SR6

PullRequests

Created

  • For XAML Hot Reload: Add public method to clear ResourceDictionary cache #22157
    area/tooling ⚙️, partner/hot-reload-xaml
  • Fixed On Platform="Default" not working #22148
    community ✨

Merged

  • [Android] Crash removing item from CarouselView - fix #22107
    platform/android 🤖, area/collectionview 📃, community ✨
  • Add VS Code Extension to move-to-vs-feedback label #22152
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • [iOS] Shell page title fix #20575
    platform/iOS 🍎, area/shell 🐢, community ✨

Updated

  • Android mipmap/appicon failing with "APT2260" #21838
    area/single project ☝️, platform/android 🤖
  • Add GCs to better validate GC related issue paths #19409
  • [WinUI] Cache gesture event subscriptions #21959
    platform/windows 🪟, area/perf 🏎️, community ✨, area/gestures, .NET 8 SR6
  • Make ImageSource more async-friendly #22098
    area/image :framed_picture:, area/controls 🎮, community ✨, control-image
  • [housekeeping] Automated PR to fix formatting errors #21092
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, do-not-merge, area/infrastructure 🏗️

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-05-01
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Unable to resolve service for type 'Microsoft.EntityFrameworkCore.DbContextOptions #33661
  • nullability wrong when select is used #33656
  • A delete/insert converted to a update allows changing property values that should not changed after insert #33653
  • CosmosManyToManyJoinEntityTypeConvention should remove the properties on the join entity type corresponding to the old partition key #33652
    Backlog

Closed

  • Discriminator columns are created in Snapshot for wrongly configured TPC mapping strategy #33605
    8.0.6
  • Wrong mapping of nested complex property with generic types and same property name, resulting in InvalidCastException #33449
    8.0.6
  • achieving join entity non-nullability semantics without startling log messages #33624
  • ChangeDetector considers a JoinEntity as deleted even if you add that back #33627
  • Are Async Gets now the recommended standard? #33647
  • Inheriting DbContext with default options or without them should have the same behavior #33578
  • Improve CheckContextConstructors method in EntityFrameworkServiceCollectionExtensions #33572
  • EF Core Change Tracking Mechanism Fail to update Entity Tracking internal Info on just Added Entity if pk field values change after entity being added to context #33562
  • Feature request: IgnoreOwnedIncludes() #33339
  • Error in Generated Migration Script for Microsoft.EntityFrameworkCore.SqlServer 8.0.4 #33651

PullRequests

Created

  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0' => 'main' #33660
    area-infrastructure, auto-merge, type-merge forward :fast_forward:
  • Update dependencies.props #33655
  • Normalize .Count != 0 to Any() in preprocessing #33654

Merged

  • Update branding to 7.0.20 #33658
  • Update branding to 6.0.31 #33657
  • [release/8.0] Fix parameter names for nested types in complex type equality (#33527) #33548
    Servicing-approved, 8.0.6
  • [release/8.0] Don't generate a discriminator in the snapshot if there's no discriminator property. #33622
    Servicing-approved, 8.0.6
  • Update branding to 8.0.6 #33659
  • Make RelationalModel lazy #33650
  • Various code cleanup/styling for Cosmos query pipeline #33637

Updated

  • Support hierarchical partition keys in Cosmos provider #33536
    breaking-change

entry.title: dotnet/installer - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-05-01
entry.content:
Issues

Closed

  • Ordering of PlatformAssemblyPaths passed to crossgen is wrong #6877

PullRequests

Created

  • Clean up contents from previously-sb tarball post binary-cleanup #19632
  • Update branding to 8.0.301 #19631
  • Update branding to 8.0.206 #19630
  • Update branding to 8.0.106 #19629
  • Update branding to 6.0.423 #19625
  • Update branding to 6.0.131 #19624
  • Migrate security-partners-dotnet pipeline to 1ES #19621

Merged

  • Fix Alpine SB legs #19623
  • Update-mariner-tag #19617
  • Enable scenario test execution in VMR build #19222
  • Fix typo in lookup for previously-source-built PackageVersions.props #19619

Updated

  • Publish PRs for Source-Build Test Results #19434
  • Use asset manifests exclusively to produce/consume previously source built artifacts #19585
    Area-SourceBuild
  • Delete SourceBuiltArtifacts after bootstrap #19616
